uientry.s:
local this = UIComponent(Address)
function ShowMenu(name) for i = 0, this:ChildCount() - 1 do local child = UIComponent(this:Find(i)) child:SetVisible(child:Id() == name) end end

uientry.unicode: Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.

uientry.s:
local choice_button = UIComponent( UIComponent( Address ):Parent() )
function OnSelect() Embedded_MakeChoice() end
function Embedded_MakeChoice()
local layout_dilemma = UIComponent( UIComponent( choice_button:Parent() ):Parent() )
layout_dilemma:InterfaceFunction("FirstChoiceSelected")
end

local choice_button = UIComponent( UIComponent( Address ):Parent() )
function OnSelect() Embedded_MakeChoice() end
function Embedded_MakeChoice()
local layout_dilemma = UIComponent( UIComponent( choice_button:Parent() ):Parent() )
layout_dilemma:InterfaceFunction("SecondChoiceSelected")
end
